merchant_customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer in the external merchant (MAX 255; MIN 1).

merchant_customer_created_at.description: Customer's registration date on the merchants platform (MAX 27; MIN 27; [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601))

date_of_birth.description: The customer's date of birth in the YYYY-MM-DD format (MAX 10; MIN 10).

document.description: Specifies the customer's document object, including its number and type. This object is not mandatory. However, if you send this information, the payment experience will be enhanced for your user.

document_number.description: The customer's document number (MAX 40; MIN 1). This field is required if the 'document' object is included in the request.

document_type.description: The customer's document type (MAX 6, MIN 1; [Country reference](country-reference)).

phone.description: Specifies the customer's phone number object. This object is not mandatory. However, if you send this information, the payment experience will be enhanced for your user.

country_code.description: The country calling code of the customer's phone (MAX 3; MIN 1). Possible values values: Check the [Country reference.](country-reference) This field is required if the 'phone' object is included in the request.

number.description: The customer's phone number, without the country code (MAX 32; MIN 1). This field is required if the 'phone' object is included in the request.

billing_address.description: Specifies the customer's billing address object. This object is not mandatory. However, if you send this information, the payment experience will be enhanced for your user.

address_line_1.description: The primary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 1). This field is required if the 'billing_address' object is included in the request.

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 1).

city.description: The city considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 1). This field is required if the 'billing_address' object is included in the request.

country.description: The country considered for the billing address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](country-reference)). This field is required if the 'billing_address' object is included in the request.

state.description: The state considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 1).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the billing address (MAX 11; MIN 3).

neighborhood.description: The neighborhood of the address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 1).

shipping_address.description: Specifies the customer's shipping address object. This object is not mandatory. However, if you send this information, the payment experience will be enhanced for your user.

address_line_1.description: The primary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 1). This field is required if the 'shipping_address' object is included in the request.

address_line_2.description: The secondary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 1).

city.description: The city considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 1). This field is required if the 'shipping_address' object is included in the request.

country.description: The country considered for the shipping address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](country-reference)). This field is required if the 'shipping_address' object is included in the request.

state.description: The state considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 1).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the shipping address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

neighborhood.description: The neighborhood of the address line of the customer(MAX 255; MIN 1).

metadata.description: Specifies a list of metadata objects. You can add up to 50 metadata objects.
